column5: Is the only public launch on Balsam at the provincial park? Thanks.
No, there is one on the opposite side of the lake. If memory serves me correctly, its in the river that connects to balsam.  I will double check that tonight, and let you know.
There's launch at Rosedale marina....that is probably the one Stoty means on river. There is another launch at Coboconk if your boating in from that river.....see launch at south bay I never tried.
Ahh, yes that name rings a bell for the Marina.
